mapper.select: select sec_report.id, sec_report.examine_info examineInfo,sec_report.sample_time sampleTime from sec_user,sec_report ,sec_patient where sec_patient.id=sec_report.examine_id and sec_user.id=sec_patient.user_id and sec_user.id=#{id}

select sec_patient.patient_name patientName,sec_patient.patient_idCard patientIdCard from sec_user,sec_report ,sec_patient where sec_patient.id=sec_report.examine_id and sec_user.id=sec_patient.user_id and sec_user.id=#{id} GROUP BY sec_patient.id

select sec_patient.patient_name patientName, sec_report.examine_info examineInfo, sec_report.sample_type sampleType, sec_report.sample_time sampleTime, sec_second_department.second_department_name secondDepartmentName, sec_second_department.second_department_address secondDepartmentAddress from sec_user,sec_report,sec_patient,sec_second_department where sec_patient.id=sec_report.examine_id and sec_user.id=sec_patient.user_id and sec_second_department.id=sec_report.clinic_department_id and sec_user.id=#{id} and sec_report.id=#{reportId}
